lu.uni.geko.util.bridges
Class EcoreResourceBridge

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.util.bridges.EcoreResourceBridge

public final class EcoreResourceBridge
extends Object

A utility class hiding details of the resources part of the Eclipse Modeling Framework API related for recurring tasks that are not project-specific.

(Note that it is disputable whether this class conforms to the bridge pattern as we are currently only providing one implementation and the "abstractions" can be regarded as low-level.)

Constructor Summary
private EcoreResourceBridge()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

Method Detail

getResourceContentRootIfUnique

public static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject getResourceContentRootIfUnique(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource)
Returns the root element of the content of the given resource if it is unique (exactly one root element) and null otherwise.

Parameters:
resource - a resource
Returns:
the unique root element (if existing) otherwise null

getUniqueContentRoot

public static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject getUniqueContentRoot(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource,
                                                                 String modelName)
Returns the root element of the content of the given resource if it is unique (exactly one root element) and throws a RuntimeException otherwise.

Parameters:
resource - a resource
modelName - the name of the model represented by this resource (for logging and error output)
Returns:
the root content element of the given resource

getUniqueContentRootIfCorrectlyTyped

public static <T extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> T getUniqueContentRootIfCorrectlyTyped(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource,
                                                                                               String modelName,
                                                                                               Class<T> rootElementClass)
Returns the root element of the content of the model at the given URI if it is unique (exactly one root element) and has the type of the given class.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the root element
Parameters:
resource - a resource
modelName - the name of the model represented by this resource (for logging and error output)
rootElementClass - the class of which the root element has to be an instance of
Returns:
the root element

getAllContentsSet

public static Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> getAllContentsSet(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource)
Returns a set containing all contents of the given resource.

Parameters:
resource - a resource
Returns:
a set containing all resource contents

saveEObjectAsOnlyContent

public static void saveEObjectAsOnlyContent(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObject,
                                            org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource)
                                     throws IOException
Saves the given eObject as the only content of the model at the given URI.

Attention: If a resource already exists at the given URI it will be overwritten!

Parameters:
eObject - the new root element
resource - the resource of which the content should be replaced or created
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurred during saving

saveResource

public static void saveResource(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource resource)
                         throws IOException
Saves the given resource.

Parameters:
resource - the resource to be saved
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurred during saving
